A: ___ is a collection of local, regional and national computer networks that are linked to exchange data and distribute processed task (a) E-mail (b) Internet browser (c) Internet
___ is correspondence conducted between one or more users on a network (a) E-mail (b) Internet browser (c) Internet
One of the following is not an Internet browser (a) Opera (b) WhatsApp (c) Netscape Navigator
When you click ___, the explorer will reload the current Web page (a) refresh (b) Stop (c) address bar
When you click on ___ button, the explorer will take you back to a previously opened Web page (a) back (b) forward (c) stop
Launching or opening a web page involves only ___ steps (a) 2 (b) 3 (c) 4
The last step when opening a Web page is ___ (a) you open the Web browser (b) you enter your Web address (c) press the enter key from your keyboard
You must not have an email account to send or receive an email (a) true (b) false (c) Absolutely
The second step in creating an email account is ___ (a) click sign up now (b) click sign into yahoo (c) click inbox in the middle of the screen
To send an email, it involves ___ steps (a) 3 (b) 4 (c) 5
The third step in sending an email is ___ (a) click on yahoo ID (b) click on compose (c) click on send
To send an email, you are required to know the recipient email address (a) true (b) false (c) Not necessarily
After reading your message, you click ___ to return to the list of received email (a) click inbox (b) click forward (c) click end
Reading your email is also known as ___ (a) chatting your email (b) Refreshing your email (c) accessing your email
___ is a form of communication, which involves sending digital messages and getting a reply immediately (a) browser (b) chat (c) preach
Digital communications limits one to text and chat alone (a) true (b) false (c) somehow
Examples of chat software include the following except ___ (a) yahoo messenger (b) Skype (c) Netscape
To initiate a chat, one must input a password (a) true (b) false (c) maybe
When chatting with yahoo messenger, one needs to click ___ button on the keyboard after typing his message (a) send (b) forward (c) back
If you have a yahoo ID, you can chat from any computer that has Internet (a) true (b) false (c) Not so
When you invite someone to a conversation, the person will see all the script of the conversation from the time the account was created (a) true (b) false (c) Not sure
Before chatting on the Internet, you need to ___ (a) Ask a parent or teacher for permission (b) Choose a username and password (c) Start chatting right away
Why is it important to choose a safe platform for chatting? (a) So you can chat with anyone you want (b) So you can keep your personal information safe (c) So you can play games online
When someone is mean or hurtful to you online, you should ___ (a) Respond back with a mean message (b) Block them and report it to a parent or teacher (c) Ignore them and keep chatting
Why is it important to keep your personal information private online? (a) So you can share it with your friends (b) So you can keep it safe from strangers (c) So you can use it to play games online
Why is it important to be patient and wait for responses when chatting online? (a) To get immediate answers (b) So you can type faster (c) So you can show respect for the other person
What should you do if you're not sure if a website or online game is safe? (a) Ask a parent or guidance for help (b) Just go ahead and play (c) Try to figure it out on your own

Why is it important to log off when you have finished chatting online? (a) So you can save your progress in a game (b) So you can chat with someone else (c) So you can keep your account and personal information safe
What is a username? (a) A type of email address (b) A secret password for all internet (c) A name you choose to identify yourself online
___ is not an important of being kind when chatting online? (a) So you can show respect (b) To be a good friend (c) So you can get more likes and followers
What should you do if someone asks you to share personal information online? (a) Share it with them (b) Chat with the person frequently (c) Ignore them and block their messages
It is important to use proper spelling and grammar when chatting online so that ___ (a) you can confuse the other person (b) you can type faster (c) you can show respect and be clear in your message
Blocking someone on the Internet means ___ (a) Stopping them from contacting you online (b) ignoring their messages (c) Reporting them to a parent
___ is the most important thing to remember when chatting online (a) To type faster (b) To never share your personal information (c) Not to log off when you're finished
The internet allow users to exchange ______ easily (a) information (b) money (c) foodstuff
Internet gives access to students to _______ journals and to have access to new trends in education (a) upload (b) download (c) reload
_____ is one of the abuses of internet (a) fraud (b) e-learning (c) advertisement
______ is not a means of interacting with other people on the internet (a) e-mail (b) chatting (c) writing
______ is not a website that provides internet chat facilities (a) MSN messenger (b) Yahoo messenger (c) chat messenger
E-mail stands for (a) Electrical mail (b) Electromechanical mail (c) Electronic mail
To access your mail, click on the _______ portion of the mail and the message will open for you to read (a) subject (b) address (c) tools bar
To send your email, you need to press the ______ button (a) send (b) refresh (c) load
Internet stands for (a) International network (b) Internal network (c) Intermediate network
________ is where you type in a webpage address (a) status bar (b) address bar (c) tools bar
The refresh button is used to _________ the current webpage (a) reload (b) resize (c) undo
The following are examples of ICT gadgets except ________ (a) telephone (b) satellite (c) fan
ICT is used for the following except ______ (a) information management (b) communication (c) deletion
Which of the following is a disadvantage of ICT? (a) access to information (b) effective human interaction (c) committing fraud
Which of the following is odd? (a) mouse (b) keyboard (c) television
The meeting spots for having online conversation or chats are called ______ (a) chat servers (b) chat room (c) private room
_______ is an application of ICT in everyday life (a) e-banking (b) hawking (c) the supermarket
